question: How many departments are in Green University?
answer: Green University of Bangladesh has 8 departments: 1) Computer Science and Engineering (CSE), 2) Electrical and Electronic Engineering (EEE), 3) Textile Engineering, 4) Business Administration (BBA), 5) Law (LLB), 6) English, 7) Journalism and Media Communication, 8) Sociology. These departments offer both undergraduate and graduate programs.
question_variations: How many departments in Green University?
How many faculties at Green University?
What departments does Green University have?

question: What is the Green University admission contact number?
answer: For admission inquiries at Green University of Bangladesh, please contact: Phone: 01775234234 or 02-9116774. Email: admission@green.edu.bd. Website: https://green.edu.bd. Office Hours: Sunday to Thursday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM.

question: What programs are offered at Green University?
answer: Green University of Bangladesh offers the following programs: Undergraduate: BSc in Computer Science and Engineering (CSE), BSc in Electrical and Electronic Engineering (EEE), BBA (Business Administration), BA (Hons) in English, LLB (Hons) in Law, BSc in Textile Engineering, BA in Journalism and Media Communication, BA in Sociology. Graduate programs are also available. Contact admission office for complete list.

question: What is the undergraduate admission fee at Green University?
answer: The admission fee for undergraduate programs at Green University is BDT 15,000 to 20,000 depending on the program. This is a one-time, non-refundable payment. CSE and EEE: BDT 20,000. BBA: BDT 15,000. Other programs: BDT 15,000-18,000.

question: What is the application fee at Green University?
answer: The application fee at Green University ranges from BDT 500 to 1,000 depending on the program and admission session. This fee is non-refundable and must be paid when submitting your application online or at the admission office.

question: Where is Green University located?
answer: Green University of Bangladesh is located at: 220/D, Begum Rokeya Sarani, Dhaka-1207, Bangladesh. The campus is in the Mirpur area of Dhaka city. Nearest landmarks: Mirpur-10 Roundabout, Begum Rokeya Sarani main road.

question: What are the general admission requirements for Green University?
answer: General admission requirements for Green University undergraduate programs: 1) Minimum GPA of 2.5 in both SSC and HSC (or equivalent), 2) Original and photocopy of SSC/HSC certificates and mark sheets, 3) Recent passport-sized photographs (4 copies), 4) National ID or birth certificate copy, 5) Application form and fee payment. Some programs have additional requirements.
question_variations: What do I need for admission?

question: What scholarships are available at Green University?
answer: Green University offers various scholarships: 1) Merit-based scholarships: 20-100% tuition waiver based on GPA, 2) Need-based financial aid: for economically disadvantaged students, 3) Freedom Fighter Quota: special consideration for children of freedom fighters, 4) Sports scholarships: for talented athletes. Apply through the Financial Aid Office with required documentation.

question: What facilities are available at Green University?
answer: Green University campus facilities include: 1) Modern classrooms with multimedia, 2) Computer labs with high-speed internet, 3) Engineering and science laboratories, 4) Central library with digital resources, 5) Cafeteria, 6) Sports facilities, 7) Student clubs and societies, 8) Wi-Fi coverage across campus, 9) Auditorium for events. Transportation services are also available.

question: What are the semester dates at Green University?
answer: Green University follows a semester system: Fall Semester: August/September to December (primary intake). Spring Semester: January to May (secondary intake). Summer Semester: May to August (optional). Each semester is approximately 4 months. Check the academic calendar on the website for exact dates each year.

question: How to enroll at Green University?
answer: To enroll at Green University: 1) Visit https://green.edu.bd for admission information, 2) Complete online application form, 3) Upload required documents, 4) Pay application fee (BDT 500-1000), 5) Attend entrance exam if required for your program, 6) Receive admission offer, 7) Pay admission and tuition fees, 8) Complete registration. Contact: 01775234234 for assistance.

question: What is the library timing at Green University?
answer: Green University Central Library timing: Sunday to Thursday: 8:30 AM to 8:00 PM. Friday: 2:30 PM to 8:00 PM. Saturday: 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM. Closed on government holidays. Students need their ID card for library access. Digital library resources available 24/7 online.
question_variations: Can I access library on weekends?

question: Does Green University have hostel facilities?
answer: Green University provides hostel information and recommendations for students who need accommodation. While on-campus hostel facilities are limited, the university assists students in finding approved nearby accommodations. Contact the Student Affairs Office for hostel guidance and approved housing lists.

question: What is the grading system at Green University?
How can I pay tuition fees at Green University?
answer: Tuition fee payment methods at Green University: 1) Bank payment: Deposit at designated bank branches, 2) Online banking: Transfer to university account, 3) bKash/Nagad: Mobile payment accepted, 4) Cash payment: At university accounts office. Payment deadline: Within first 2 weeks of semester. Late payment may incur additional charges.

question: What is the official website of Green University?
answer: The official website of Green University of Bangladesh is: https://green.edu.bd. The admission portal can be accessed at: https://admission.green.edu.bd. For latest updates, announcements, and online applications, always visit the official website.
